item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Tehlife Tehlife
item.description:
@Tehlife wrote:

Ok ill try give you a fix but remember this is PI.
Put it under Owner commands:

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("item")) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("That item ID does not exist.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Wrong usage: Use as ::item ID AMOUNT");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
			}

Read full topic

item.title: Pickup command
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Oke, I have a problem with my pickup command if i try to type ::pickup 14594 1
The message wrong syntax use as 0995 1 i try this is works but can i make the command something longer that i can use the 14594?

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("---") || playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (/*newItemID <= 20000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10"); }
